notes: Naimur Rahman acted as runner for Athar Ali Khan from the 14th over.

milestones.description: Athar Ali Khan and Akram Khan's 110-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 4th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 50 between Minhajul Abedin and Athar Ali Khan
Athar Ali Khan has scored 2 fifty-plus scores in ODIs, the most for BAN breaking Faruque Ahmed's record
Athar Ali Khan has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (38) in an innings in ODIs for BAN, going past Athar Ali Khan's 24
Athar Ali Khan's 82 is the highest individual score in ODIs (for BAN), surpassing Athar Ali Khan's 78
This is the highest match aggregate (529) involving teams Pakistan & Bangladesh in ODIs
Athar Ali Khan and Akram Khan's 110-run partnership is BAN's highest for any wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 108 between Faruque Ahmed and Athar Ali Khan
